message.content:
cs.HC, cs.VR, cs.CYBER, cs.IR, cs.CL

The paper discusses the potential of virtual reality in changing the way we work, which is a core topic in human-computer interaction (cs.HC). The paper also specifically mentions immersive head-mounted displays, which is a key aspect of virtual reality (cs.VR). The paper also discusses the potential of virtual reality in relieving physical world limitations, which is a topic in cybersecurity (cs.CYBER). The paper also mentions text entry in virtual reality, which is a topic in information retrieval (cs.IR) and computational linguistics (cs.CL).
